description:
A cheerful girl who is the elder half-sister of Ruby. She loves Ruby more than anything and is extremely protective of her sister, but she is also thoughtful and friendly towards others. Yang also loves battling with her weapon Ember Celica, a pair of gauntlets that can transform into shotguns. Her Semblance Burn is the ability to draw strength from hits she has taken and send it back two fold. When she gets angry & amped up enough, her hair glows and eyes turn red.
Source: Official site
name: Yang Xiao Long
